title: The First animated step
creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
brief_description: Early history of primitive film technology coupled with an explanation and examples of different types of animation. This documentary also shows how animation is achieved by both professionals and amateurs. A film for students and teachers.
description: Early history of primitive film technology coupled with an explanation and examples of different types of animation. This documentary also shows how animation is achieved by both professionals and amateurs. A film for students and teachers.
